column2: title=The Return of the King: The Best of White Dwarf Magazine
author=Matthew Ward, Chris Bone, Alessio Cavatore, David Smith, Adam O'Brien

date=[[2004]] ([[30 November]] [[2003]]<ref>[http://www.amazon.com/Return-King-White-Dwarf-Compilation/dp/1841546186/ref=sr_1_2?s=books&ie=UTF8&qid=1316296465&sr=1-2 The Return of the King: White Dwarf Compilation] at [http://www.amazon.com/ref=gno_logo Amazon.com] (accessed 17 September 2011)</ref>)

column1: '''''The Return of the King: The Best of White Dwarf Magazine''''' is a collection of articles, originally published in various issues of ''[[White Dwarf]]'', concerned with [[Games Workshop]]'s ''[[The Lord of the Rings Strategy Battle Game]]''.

This compilation is a collection of the best articles from the pages of White Dwarf magazine and forms an invaluable resource for anyone involved in The Lord of The Rings battle game. Inside you will find rules, scenarios, painting & modelling advice and battle reports.
{{DEFAULTSORT:Return of the King: The Best of White Dwarf Magazine, The}}
